description: "Review proposed architecture for Quantum Voice AI MVP"
---

You are reviewing architecture for Quantum Voice AI: QR-to-Call Lead Agent.

1. Read AGENTS.md and project_kernel.json.
2. Ensure any proposed architecture:
   - Supports QR → call → lead capture → Asana + email.
   - Matches the tech stack (Next.js, Supabase, LiveKit, Deepgram).
3. Highlight risks or missing components.
